text.tspan: Per capita CO₂ emissions from domestic aviation vs. land area, 2018
Domestic aviation represents flights which depart and arrive within the same country.
Per capita CO₂ from domestic aviation
Data source: Graver, Zhang & Rutherford (2019). International Council of Clean Transportation (ICCT); World Bank
